00041 #include "OgreRoot.h"

00047 PagingLandScapeOctreeIntersectionSceneQuery::PagingLandScapeOctreeIntersectionSceneQuery(SceneManager* creator)
00048         : DefaultIntersectionSceneQuery(creator)
00049 {
00050 
00051 }

00054 PagingLandScapeOctreeIntersectionSceneQuery::~PagingLandScapeOctreeIntersectionSceneQuery(void)

00056 }
00057 
00058 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 void PagingLandScapeOctreeIntersectionSceneQuery::execute(IntersectionSceneQueryListener* listener)
00060 {
00061         typedef std::pair<MovableObject *, MovableObject *> MovablePair;
00062         typedef std::set
00063                 < std::pair<MovableObject *, MovableObject *> > MovableSet;
00064 
00065         MovableSet set;
00066 
00067         // Iterate over all movable types
00068         Root::MovableObjectFactoryIterator factIt = 
00069                 Root::getSingleton().getMovableObjectFactoryIterator();
00070         while(factIt.hasMoreElements())
00071         {
00072                 SceneManager::MovableObjectIterator it = 
00073                         mParentSceneMgr->getMovableObjectIterator(
00074                         factIt.getNext()->getType());
00075                 while( it.hasMoreElements() )
00076                 {
00077 
00078                         MovableObject * e = it.getNext();
00079 
00080                         std::list < SceneNode * > list;
00081                         //find the nodes that intersect the AAB
00082                         static_cast<PagingLandScapeOctreeSceneManager*>( mParentSceneMgr ) -> findNodesIn( e->getWorldBoundingBox(), list, 0 );
00083                         //grab all movables from the node that intersect...
00084                         std::list < SceneNode * >::iterator itscn = list.begin();
00085                         while( itscn != list.end() )
00086                         {
00087                                 SceneNode::ObjectIterator oit = (*itscn) -> getAttachedObjectIterator();
00088                                 while( oit.hasMoreElements() )
00089                                 {
00090                                         MovableObject * m = oit.getNext();
00091 
00092                                         if( m != e &&
00093                                                 set.find( MovablePair(e,m)) == set.end() &&
00094                                                 set.find( MovablePair(m,e)) == set.end() &&
00095                                                 (m->getQueryFlags() & mQueryMask) &&
00096                                                 (m->getTypeFlags() & mQueryTypeMask) &&
00097                                                 m->isInScene() && 
00098                                                 e->getWorldBoundingBox().intersects( m->getWorldBoundingBox() ) )
00099                                         {
00100                                                 listener -> queryResult( e, m );
00101                                                 // deal with attached objects, since they are not directly attached to nodes
00102                                                 if (m->getMovableType() == "Entity")
00103                                                 {
00104                                                         Entity* e2 = static_cast<Entity*>(m);
00105                                                         Entity::ChildObjectListIterator childIt = e2->getAttachedObjectIterator();
00106                                                         while(childIt.hasMoreElements())
00107                                                         {
00108                                                                 MovableObject* c = childIt.getNext();
00109                                                                 if (c->getQueryFlags() & mQueryMask && 
00110                                                                         e->getWorldBoundingBox().intersects( c->getWorldBoundingBox() ))
00111                                                                 {
00112                                                                         listener->queryResult(e, c);
00113                                                                 }
00114                                                         }
00115                                                 }
00116                                         }
00117                                         set.insert( MovablePair(e,m) );
00118 
00119                                 }
00120                                 ++itscn;
00121                         }
00122 
00123                 }
00124         }
00125 }
00126 
00127 }
